## lifeCycleObserverFilter variable

Find all life cycle observer bindings. By default, a binding tagged with `CoreTags.LIFE_CYCLE_OBSERVER`<!-- -->. It's used as `BindingFilter`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
lifeCycleObserverFilter: BindingTagFilter
```
